Sum function

Enter parameters as '(x,y)' or '(x)(y)'

              
export const sum = (x: number, y?: number): number => {
  if (!y) {
    return sum.bind(null, x);
  }
  return x + y;
};

Refactor function

              
export const isValid = (valid: boolean): string => {
  if (!valid) {
    return 'invalid';
  }
  return 'valid';
};

Count function

              
const count = (() => {
  let counter = 0;
  return () => {  counter++ ; return counter };
})();
